thread.title: On the Air

title: On the Air
text:
Published October 21. 2015 12:01AM 
Baseball 
4 p.m., FS1 — ALCS: Kansas City Royals at Toronto Blue Jays in Game 5. 
8 p.m., TBS, WOR (710-AM) — NLCS: New York Mets at Chicago Cubs in Game 4. 
Basketball 
8 p.m., ESPN — NBA preseason: Washington Wizards at Miami Heat. 
Hockey 
8 p.m., NBCSN — NHL: Philadelphia Flyers at Boston Bruins. 
Soccer 
2:30 p.m., ESPN2 — UEFA Champions League: Borussia Monchengladbach at Juventus. 
10 p.m., ESPN2 — Women's exhibition: United States vs. Brazil from Seattle.
